page.title: 17Leisure Survey.
page.content: Stoke Hill and Ladysmith Middle Schools surveyed leisure time and facilities respectively.The following centres are available to people in the{area:Clifton Hill Sport Centre; {Exeter University School of Education; {Exeter City Swimming Baths;Middlemoor {Police Swimming Pool.}All these centres run activities for children in the holidays. As well as asking children, Stoke Hill School asked parents and grandparents how they spent their leisure time.55% of families used a local sports centre; 26% used a community centre; 29% used facilities provided by an employee or school.95% of children under 12 spent over 5 hours a week on very active sports and 84% of grandmothers spent 8 hours per week on handicrafts (on average).(These figures and others by Thelma Sheldon)
